short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to reference pages on thefreedictionary.com and freethesaurus.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Reference options, highlight a word and use the right-click menu, or click the toolbar button. By default, the keyboard shortcut for opening the Popup is Alt+T. To change the shortcut, paste this into the address bar: chrome://extensions/shortcuts

All languages supported by thefreedictionary.com are available in this extension. See the Options page for details (right-click the toolbar button and select "Options").

This extension is not affiliated with thefreedictionary.com or freethesaurus.com.
